name: Grandma's German "Potato" Salad
ingredients: 1 tablespoon dill pickle juice (from Clausen deli dills)

instructions.en: Cook the frozen cauliflower until very tender, then drain.
instructions.sk: Varte mrazenú karfiolovú ružičku, kým nebude veľmi mäkká, potom sceďte.
instructions.ja: 冷凍カリフラワーを非常に柔らかくなるまで茹で、水を切ります。

instructions.en: Chop the cooked cauliflower into bite-size pieces.
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte uvarenú karfiolovú ružičku na kúsky veľkosti sústa.
instructions.ja: 茹でたカリフラワーを一口大に切ります。

instructions.en: Chop the bacon and cook until crisp.
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte slaninu a opečte do chrumkava.
instructions.ja: ベーコンを刻み、カリカリになるまで炒めます。

instructions.en: In a medium bowl, mix sour cream, mayonnaise, finely sliced green onions, fresh parsley, and dill pickle juice.
instructions.sk: V stredne veľkej miske zmiešajte kyslú smotanu, majonézu, najemno nakrájanú jarnú cibuľku, čerstvú petržlenovú vňať a šťavu z nakladaných uhoriek.
instructions.ja: 中サイズのボウルにサワークリーム、マヨネーズ、細かく刻んだ青ねぎ、新鮮なパセリ、ディルピクルスの汁を入れて混ぜます。

instructions.en: Add salt and pepper to the dressing mixture to taste.
instructions.sk: Pridajte soľ a korenie do dresingu podľa chuti.
instructions.ja: ドレッシングの混合物に塩コショウで味を調えます。

instructions.en: Stir the chopped cauliflower into the dressing mixture until well coated.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte nakrájanú karfiolovú ružičku do dresingu, až kým nebude dobre obalená.
instructions.ja: 刻んだカリフラワーをドレッシングの混合物に加え、よくからむまで混ぜます。

instructions.en: Add the crispy bacon to the salad and mix well.
instructions.sk: Pridajte chrumkavú slaninu do šalátu a dobre premiešajte.
instructions.ja: カリカリのベーコンをサラダに加えてよく混ぜます。

instructions.en: Serve warm or cold. To serve warm, heat on a low power setting in the microwave, but don't let it boil.
instructions.sk: Podávajte teplé alebo studené. Ak chcete podávať teplé, ohrejte na nízkom výkone v mikrovlnnej rúre, ale nenechajte variť.
instructions.ja: 温かいまま、または冷やして提供します。温かく提供する場合は、電子レンジの低出力で温めますが、沸騰させないように注意してください。

notes: This Grandma's German "Potato" Salad is a keto-friendly version of the classic German potato salad, using cauliflower instead of potatoes to keep it low-carb. The combination of sour cream, mayonnaise, and pickle juice creates a tangy dressing that mimics the traditional flavor profile. The bacon adds a savory crunch, while the green onions and parsley provide freshness. This salad can be served warm or cold, making it versatile for different occasions. Remember that when reheating, use a low power setting to avoid overcooking the cauliflower or curdling the dressing.
